data.eml:eml: A revision of the West Palaearctic species of Colobostema Enderlein, 1926 (Diptera, Scatopsidae). Part I. European subregion

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jean-Paul Haenni (2013): A revision of the West Palaearctic species of Colobostema Enderlein, 1926 (Diptera, Scatopsidae). Part I. European subregion. Mitteilungen Der Schweizerischen Entomologischen Gesellschaft 86: 199-242, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5169/seals-403072
